fullDescription.intro: This layer crops the layer input in three dimensions. Corresponds to the Keras Cropping 3D Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.
A tuple of two integers. How many units should be trimmed off at the beginning and end of the first spatial dimension.
A tuple of two integers. How many units should be trimmed off at the beginning and end of the second spatial dimension.
A tuple of two integers. How many units should be trimmed off at the beginning and end of the third spatial dimension.

ul.li: channels_last: corresponds to inputs with shape (spatial_dim1, spatial_dim2, spatial_dim3, channels)
channels_first: corresponds to inputs with shape (channels, spatial_dim1, spatial_dim2, spatial_dim3)

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Cropping 3D layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Cropping 3D layer.
